name: Aetherfall
description:
Aetherfall is a first-person puzzle platformer set in a dystopian world where the rich control the upper districts and the less fortunate live beneath them. As a member of the resistance, you have gained the ability to control the Aether through an ancient artifact. Using your powers, you must navigate through the world, solve puzzles, and find your way to challenge the Syndicate, the oppressive ruling class.

Use Aether control to slow, speed up, and stop time and shift gravity to reach new areas. Uncover the secrets of the Aether and help the resistance in their fight for freedom. Play the demo now and join the resistance.

Instructions:

  • Use WASD to move.
  • Press 1, 2, or 3 to switch between your Aether abilities.
  • Press Q to use your current ability.
  • Press E to revert any gravity effects.
  • Abilities (Effect lasts for a short time)
    • Stasis - Stops platforms in place 
    • Muddle - Slows platforms down 
    •  Hyper - Speed platforms up
  • There are checkpoints, but the game doesn't tell you that you activated them.
    • They are the weird portal looking things with the green effects.
  • The game is beatable, although it has difficult parts.

Developed in 4 days for Finnish College Jam #4 

By Santeri Yliniemelä and Niina Keränen
